name: tw-colors
description: Tailwind plugin for switching color theme with just one className

scripts.postpublish: git add . && git commit -a && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags && git push
scripts.visual: npm run build && cd visual && vite
scripts.release:pre:beta: git pull && node scripts/check-beta-version.js && npm run build
scripts.release:pre:stable: git pull && node scripts/check-stable-version.js && npm run build
scripts.release:stable: npm run release:pre:stable && npm publish && npm run release:post
scripts.release:beta: npm run release:pre:beta && npm publish --tag beta && npm run release:post
scripts.release:post: git add . && git commit -a && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags && git push
